i enjoy summer walking and reading.

participant_2.background:
I'm not exactly rich, but I like to use my money to travel and experience new things.
My first purchase was a journal that I would fill with my thoughts and reflections.
I am a parkour enthusiast and a cat lover.
i live in vermont.
i own a dog who is my best friend.

content.text: What is your favorite type of gaming computer?
I think gaming laptops are really cool, but they can get pricey. I have a gaming desktop that I built myself.
That's really cool! I have a gaming laptop too. It's a little old but it still runs great.
What games do you like to play?
I mostly play RPGs and strategy games. I've been playing a lot of the Witcher 3 lately.
Oh cool! I've been wanting to play that game for a while. I've heard really good things about it.
It's definitely worth checking out. It's a long game, but it's really immersive and well-made.
I'm a big fan of long games, so that's perfect. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I also like to play a lot of board games.
Oh, I love board games too! What are some of your favorites?
I really like Catan and Ticket to Ride. I also like playing some of the newer board games like Gloomhaven and Terraforming Mars.
Oh cool! I've heard good things about Gloomhaven. I'll have to check that one out.
You should! It's a really cool cooperative game.
Sounds great! I love cooperative games.
It's a lot of fun. I'm always looking for new people to play board games with.
I'm down to play some time. I'm free on most weekends.
Awesome! I'll let you know when I'm free
